etymologies: early 17th century (denoting nodding of the head): from Latin nutatio(n-), from nutare ‘to nod’

definitions: a periodic variation in the inclination of the axis of a rotating object.
shortDefinitions: periodic variation in inclination of axis of rotating object

definitions: a periodic oscillation of the earth's axis that causes the precession of the poles to follow a wavy rather than a circular path.
shortDefinitions: periodic oscillation of earth's axis that causes precession of poles

definitions: the circular swaying movement of the tip of a growing shoot.
shortDefinitions: circular swaying movement of tip of growing shoot
